channel.title: VV/-/3N !_! G!_!YS S74R7 C/-/3471NG?(when you guys start cheating? )
channel.description:
^^^ I'm not a cheater personally,I come for the ps(priv servers) mainly I first heard about ps's when I was looking on a topic in a fansite.(non-runescape)they had pics of a priv server.that got closed cause of flame.I then learned that a client was called moparscape,the safest,and searched.Then I did some research and then played servers.I was fed up with waiting for servers to starts,so I decided to come up with my own.I currently work with 4 sources,cheezscape,whitescape,taylor(scape),nixscape.
SO,post how you guys got hooked on ps's or cheating!

item.title: VV/-/3N !_! G!_!YS S74R7 C/-/3471NG?(when you guys start cheating? )
item.dc:creator: @Jared Jared
item.description:
@Jared wrote:

2003 when i first started, i got my char to like lvl 81 legit then i discovered cheating with scar, i was first at runecms in the 2003 day and then joined kaits at the same time, now i dont really play any more and just shoot the breeze and program some stuff for cheating. lol

Read full topic

item.title: VV/-/3N !_! G!_!YS S74R7 C/-/3471NG?(when you guys start cheating? )
item.dc:creator: @Got_Shine Got_Shine
item.description:
@Got_Shine wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:4, topic:4084”]hmm i joined rs beggining of 2005, bout june 2005 i started downloading a couple of auto clickers to auto mine (i thought i was so 1337) which i found out didnt work… then from their on through to about november i was still on a search to find proper auto’s… did mostly legit then, and then i found sythe.org… it wasnt my idea of a cheating community but i joined… for about a month i stayed active their… then just wasnt for a while. then around april i think i joined here to find aryan, i definatly was in-active but always found aryan updated… then the auto updater came out and that was great… then aryan stopped and i became oh so very active here :)[/quote]Give or take a few details, and thats my story. Althought I’m out of rs now.

Read full topic
item.source: VV/-/3N !_! G!_!YS S74R7 C/-/3471NG?(when you guys start cheating? )

item.title: VV/-/3N !_! G!_!YS S74R7 C/-/3471NG?(when you guys start cheating? )
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

In early 2004 my community career started:
richyt.com (the one by RichyT himself) -> rscheatnet.com -> kaitnieks.com -> moparisthebest.com.
^^Those are the main ones, I have registered on about 20 different cheating related forums during these two and half years. I first used SCAR in late 2003.

Wenakko is lying, he aint drunk nor did he join any cheating community in 2002 =D.

And VG_Kobra, I have used SCAR since version 1.06, so I’m way cooler than you :D. Also, SCAR wasn’t nowhere close to its early steps in August 2005.

Kaitnieks.com site was founded somewhere in the spring-summer 2004, and the forums started in October 2004. Every fag who says they’ve been on kaitnieks’ forums for over 1.5 years can suck Wenakko’s ePenis. It’s huge.

Read full topic

item.title: VV/-/3N !_! G!_!YS S74R7 C/-/3471NG?(when you guys start cheating? )
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

late 04
randomly searched on google “how to spot scams” then found kaitnieks list on the homepage (not forums) about how to spot fake programs and the real ones, which listed scar and sbot i think…then joined the community to see what it was like. havent been the same since
but i kinda gave up when kaitnieks shut down, i didnt have anything to do with this forum until just very recently

Read full topic

item.title: VV/-/3N !_! G!_!YS S74R7 C/-/3471NG?(when you guys start cheating? )
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Shame shame! We the people of the cheating community say shame on you! lol jk jk. Who cares, it’s just a silly game. Not like you’re dealing with a god… the god of runescape… and he will smite you if you cheat lol.

I started cheating in 2005. I used a lot of scripts and I was thunderstruck when my account, RonTheCon, got banned. I tried everything to get it back, I even sent Jagex a letter to their company home but I never got a reply back. Obviously it was my fault I got banned. And ever since then I was active on kaitnieks.com and then switched to this website.

Read full topic
